hp_raw: 130 ( fast healing 10 ,  negative healing , one more breath)
markdown:
Roused rudely from their nightmarish slumber, the provincial jiang-shi roams the villages and graveyards around their domain searching for sustenance to slake their hunger. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Provincial Jiang-Shi](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1909) **Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 158, [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 86 **Perception** +22; breathsense (precise) 60 feet, [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22 **Str** +5 **Dex** +3 **Con** +4 **Int** +3 **Wis** +7 **Cha** +3 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)_ --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +18 **Will** +24 **HP** 130 ([fast healing 10](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15), [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), one more breath) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [_sleep_](/Spells.aspx?ID=288), [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) **Resistances** physical 10 (except [darkwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=376)) **Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities**
**Warped Fulu** --- **Speed** 15 feet; rigor mortis **Melee** claw +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d10+11 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** _mace_ +23 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 2d6+11 bludgeoning **Divine Innate Spells** DC 32, attack +22 - **3rd** [Bind Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=22), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (×3) - **4th** [Enervation](/Spells.aspx?ID=687), [Ghostly Tragedy](/Spells.aspx?ID=692) (×2) - **5th** [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273) - **6th** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×7), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353) **Drain Qi** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When Draining Qi, the provincial jiang-shi regains 13 HP.
name: Provincial Jiang-Shi

text: Provincial Jiang-Shi Roused rudely from their nightmarish slumber, the provincial jiang-shi roams the villages and graveyards around their domain searching for sustenance to slake their hunger. Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 28 Unspecific Lore : DC 26 Specific Lore : DC 23 Provincial Jiang-Shi Source Book of the Dead pg. 158, Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight! pg. 86 Perception +22; breathsense (precise) 60 feet, darkvision Languages Common, Necril, Tien Skills Acrobatics +16, Athletics +22, Intimidation +20, Religion +22 Str +5 Dex +3 Con +4 Int +3 Wis +7 Cha +3 Items +1 striking mace --- AC 31 Fort +21 Ref +18 Will +24 HP 130 (fast healing 10, negative healing, one more breath) Immunities death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, sleep , prone Resistances physical 10 (except darkwood) Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities Warped Fulu --- Speed 15 feet; rigor mortis Melee Single Action claw +22 (Agile), Damage 2d10+11 piercing plus Grab Melee Single Action mace +23 (Magical, Shove), Damage 2d6+11 bludgeoning Divine Innate Spells DC 32, attack +22 - 3rd Bind Undead, Fear (×3) - 4th Enervation, Ghostly Tragedy (×2) - 5th Shadow Blast - 6th Harm (×7), Spirit Blast, Vampiric Exsanguination Drain Qi Single Action (Divine, Necromancy) When Draining Qi, the provincial jiang-shi regains 13 HP.
